text.autoconfig.nearsightedly.title: Near-Sightedly Config
text.autoconfig.nearsightedly.option.min: Sets the minimum allowed render distance.
This will be corrected if needed (between 2 and 32 by default)
If this is greater than the maximum, the values will be swapped.
text.autoconfig.nearsightedly.option.max: Sets the maximum allowed render distance.
This will be corrected if needed (between 2 and 32 by default)
If this is less than the minimum, the values will be swapped.
